meanings.definition: A person who saves, rescues, or delivers others from danger or harm.
meanings.sent1: The brave firefighter was seen as a saviour when he rescued the family from the burning building.
meanings.sent2: The lifeguard acted as a saviour when he pulled the struggling swimmer to safety.
meanings.sent3: The superhero costume made him look like a saviour ready to save the day.
meanings.sent4: Her quick thinking and first aid skills were a saviour in the emergency situation.
meanings.sent5: The search and rescue team was the true saviour for the lost hikers in the wilderness.
